languages.text: "Я пересказываю со слов тех, кто вышел со мной на связь. Эти подати... уже несколько поселений перешли на плату людьми. Говорят, для таких сговорчивых общин у псов губернатора свой подход. Налаживают им поставки медикаментов. Организуют охрану. А потом вообще изолируют — так, что никто связаться с теми, кто в оцеплении, не может!"

traits.locale_text: "Я пересказываю со слов тех, кто вышел со мной на связь. Эти подати... уже несколько поселений перешли на плату людьми. Говорят, для таких сговорчивых общин у псов губернатора свой подход. Налаживают им поставки медикаментов. Организуют охрану. А потом вообще изолируют — так, что никто связаться с теми, кто в оцеплении, не может!"

languages.text: "I'll tell you exactly what I was told by the people who contacted me. These tithes... some settlements have already switched to paying with people. They say that amenable settlements get special treatment from the governor's dogs. They arrange for medicine to be supplied to the settlement. Then security. And then they completely isolate them — all contact between those inside the settlement and the outside world is cut off!"

А потом вообще изолируют — так, что никто связаться с теми, кто в оцеплении, не может!"

languages.text: 「私に連絡を取ってきた住民から聞いた話を、そのままお伝えします。こうした貢納に…人間での支払いに切り替えた開拓地もすでにあります。住民の話では、命令に従順な開拓地は総督の犬どもから特別待遇を受けるそうです。開拓地に薬を供給するよう手配されます。それから警備。その後、完全に孤立させられ…開拓地内の人間は、外界とのあらゆる接触を断たれるのです！」
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you exactly what I was told by the people who contacted me. These tithes... some settlements have already switched to paying with people. They say that amenable settlements get special treatment from the governor's dogs. They arrange for medicine to be supplied to the settlement. Then security. And then they completely isolate them — all contact between those inside the settlement and the outside world is cut off!"

traits.locale_text: 「私に連絡を取ってきた住民から聞いた話を、そのままお伝えします。こうした貢納に…人間での支払いに切り替えた開拓地もすでにあります。住民の話では、命令に従順な開拓地は総督の犬どもから特別待遇を受けるそうです。開拓地に薬を供給するよう手配されます。それから警備。その後、完全に孤立させられ…開拓地内の人間は、外界とのあらゆる接触を断たれるのです！」

languages.text: “我的联系人告诉我的一切，我都愿意告诉你。那些什一税……有些定居点已经改用居民来抵税了。那些人说，愿意配合总督的定居点会得到优厚的待遇，和那些走狗的待遇一样。他们说，他们会为定居点提供药品，保障居民安全。但接下来，那些人会彻底隔绝这些定居点，切断里面的人与外界的一切联系！”
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you exactly what I was told by the people who contacted me. These tithes... some settlements have already switched to paying with people. They say that amenable settlements get special treatment from the governor's dogs. They arrange for medicine to be supplied to the settlement. Then security. And then they completely isolate them — all contact between those inside the settlement and the outside world is cut off!"

traits.locale_text: “我的联系人告诉我的一切，我都愿意告诉你。那些什一税……有些定居点已经改用居民来抵税了。那些人说，愿意配合总督的定居点会得到优厚的待遇，和那些走狗的待遇一样。他们说，他们会为定居点提供药品，保障居民安全。但接下来，那些人会彻底隔绝这些定居点，切断里面的人与外界的一切联系！”

languages.text: «Le contaré lo que me dijo exactamente la gente que se puso en contacto conmigo. Estos diezmos... algunos asentamientos ya solo los pagan con personas. Dicen que gracias a eso reciben un trato especial de los perros de la gobernadora. Primero les envían un suministro de medicina. Después, equipos de seguridad. Y, por último, los aíslan por completo. ¡Cortan todo contacto entre los asentamientos y el mundo exterior!».
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you exactly what I was told by the people who contacted me. These tithes... some settlements have already switched to paying with people. They say that amenable settlements get special treatment from the governor's dogs. They arrange for medicine to be supplied to the settlement. Then security. And then they completely isolate them — all contact between those inside the settlement and the outside world is cut off!"

traits.locale_text: «Le contaré lo que me dijo exactamente la gente que se puso en contacto conmigo. Estos diezmos... algunos asentamientos ya solo los pagan con personas. Dicen que gracias a eso reciben un trato especial de los perros de la gobernadora. Primero les envían un suministro de medicina. Después, equipos de seguridad. Y, por último, los aíslan por completo. ¡Cortan todo contacto entre los asentamientos y el mundo exterior!».

languages.text: "Ich werde Euch genau berichten, was die Leute, die mich kontaktiert haben, mir erzählt haben. Dieser Zehnt ... einige Ansiedlungen begleichen ihn mittlerweile mit Menschen. Sie sagen, dafür offene Ansiedlungen erhalten eine Spezialbehandlung von den Hunden der Gouverneurin. Es werden zum Beispiel Medikamente angeliefert. Dann wird die Sicherheit erhöht. Und schließlich erfolgt komplette Isolation – jeder Kontakt zwischen der Ansiedlung und der Außenwelt wird unterbunden!"
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you exactly what I was told by the people who contacted me. These tithes... some settlements have already switched to paying with people. They say that amenable settlements get special treatment from the governor's dogs. They arrange for medicine to be supplied to the settlement. Then security. And then they completely isolate them — all contact between those inside the settlement and the outside world is cut off!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Euch genau berichten, was die Leute, die mich kontaktiert haben, mir erzählt haben. Dieser Zehnt ... einige Ansiedlungen begleichen ihn mittlerweile mit Menschen. Sie sagen, dafür offene Ansiedlungen erhalten eine Spezialbehandlung von den Hunden der Gouverneurin. Es werden zum Beispiel Medikamente angeliefert. Dann wird die Sicherheit erhöht. Und schließlich erfolgt komplette Isolation – jeder Kontakt zwischen der Ansiedlung und der Außenwelt wird unterbunden!"

languages.text: « Je vais vous dire ce que m'ont raconté ceux qui m'ont contacté. Certains villages ont déjà commencé à payer leurs taxes en êtres humains et affirment bénéficier d'un traitement de faveur de la part des sbires de la gouverneure. Ils commencent par leur fournir des médicaments, puis la sécurité des lieux est renforcée. Enfin, ils les isolent, coupant tout contact avec l'extérieur ! »
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you exactly what I was told by the people who contacted me. These tithes... some settlements have already switched to paying with people. They say that amenable settlements get special treatment from the governor's dogs. They arrange for medicine to be supplied to the settlement. Then security. And then they completely isolate them — all contact between those inside the settlement and the outside world is cut off!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vais vous dire ce que m'ont raconté ceux qui m'ont contacté. Certains villages ont déjà commencé à payer leurs taxes en êtres humains et affirment bénéficier d'un traitement de faveur de la part des sbires de la gouverneure. Ils commencent par leur fournir des médicaments, puis la sécurité des lieux est renforcée. Enfin, ils les isolent, coupant tout contact avec l'extérieur ! »

languages.text: "Size benimle iletişime geçenlerin söylediği şeyleri aynen aktarayım. Bazı yerleşim yerleri, aşarları insanlarla ödemeye başlamış bile. Sorumluluklarını bu şekilde yerine getiren yerleşimlerin, valinin itlerinden özel muamele gördüğünü söylüyorlar. Buralara ilaç desteği ayarlıyorlarmış. Güvenlik desteği de. Tamamen izole hâle geldiklerindeyse yerleşim yerinin içinde bulunanlarla dış dünya arasındaki irtibat tamamen kopuyormuş!"
languages.original_text: "I'll tell you exactly what I was told by the people who contacted me. These tithes... some settlements have already switched to paying with people. They say that amenable settlements get special treatment from the governor's dogs. They arrange for medicine to be supplied to the settlement. Then security. And then they completely isolate them — all contact between those inside the settlement and the outside world is cut off!"

traits.locale_text: "Size benimle iletişime geçenlerin söylediği şeyleri aynen aktarayım. Bazı yerleşim yerleri, aşarları insanlarla ödemeye başlamış bile.
